notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: K.M.H. and C.Z.W. designed and supervised the project. Z.Y., F.Z., Y.S. and L.Y. performed GA search. F.M., R.T.O., M.J.K., S.Z. and R.E.N. designed and performed experiments and XRD measurements. M.I.M. developed the Finnis-Sinclair potential for the Al-Sm system. Z.Y. and M.J.K. performed the Rietveld refinement. F.Z. performed free energy calculation. Z.Y., F.M., and F.Z. wrote the paper.
